formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Strip footing volume: V = L \times B \times T Rectangular pad footing volume: V = N \times (L \times W \times T) Cylindrical pier footing volume: V = N \times \pi \left(\frac{D}{2}\right)^2 \times H Waste factor: V_{\text{total}} = V \times \left(1 + \frac{w}{100}\right) Conversions: 1~\text{yd}^3 = 27~\text{ft}^3,\quad 1~\text{m}^3 = 35.3147~\text{ft}^3 Estimated weight (normal-weight concrete): W_{\text{US}} = V_{\text{ft}^3}\times 150~\frac{\text{lb}}{\text{ft}^3}, \quad W_{\text{Metric}} = V_{\text{m}^3}\times 2400~\frac{\text{kg}}{\text{m}^3} Bag counts (US examples): \text{Bags}_{80} = \left\lceil \frac{V_{\text{ft}^3}}{0.60} \right\rceil,\quad \text{Bags}_{60} = \left\lceil \frac{V_{\text{ft}^3}}{0.45} \right\rceil,\quad \text{Bags}_{40} = \left\lceil \frac{V_{\text{ft}^3}}{0.30} \right\rceil Bag counts (Metric example): \text{Bags}_{25\text{kg}} = \left\lceil \frac{V_{\text{m}^3}}{0.012} \right\rceil

changes: Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
Verify formulas match the calculator engine and convert any text-only formulas to LaTeX.
Confirm sources are authoritative and relevant to the calculator methodology.
